children.text: There is a void/bulkhead frame that needs to be constructed to conceal the pipe/duct in this area behind plasterboard.

If this duct void/bulkhead is not shown on the contract drawings/plans, the builder should either ask the owner to sign a variation to the contract (with reasonable compensation), or re-route the services through a designated void area.
Alternatively, the framing void should be constructed around the services to allow proper installation of plasterboard.
